alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington and central Adair Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 330 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Baron, and another near Proctor, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Stilwell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Lincoln... Westville... Adair State Park... Proctor... Christie... Strickler... Cincinnati... Blackburn... Baron... Maryetta... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Clyde... Rhea... Canehill... Hogeye... Summers... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern and east central Oklahoma.
